What's This

  1. Wellcome to my Portal.
  2. Click the colorful blocks to Visit my blogs.
  3. Follow me at G+ or Liknedin from buttons at the top right.
  4. Also can Share this page by click the buttons left.
  5. Connect me by the infomations showing at the bottom.

About Me

Hi! This is my personal portal. I build this to be the index of my blogs hosting on github.

My blogs mostly are technical blogs. Some are written by my self, others are copied from web-set, which ever had problems.
